camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Expansive Aerial Panorama, High-angle drone shot, Cityscape establishing shot
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: Wide-angle 24mm, Distortion-free, High sharpness edge-to-edge, Deep depth of field (f/8 - f/11)
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Infinite focus, Sharp details from foreground to distant sky

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Night (Blue Hour), Night but with visible sky
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: High-intensity Artificial City Glow, Point-source specularity (sparkle), High Contrast (Chiaroscuro), Light Pollution Haze
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Clear night with slight urban atmospheric scattering (glow around bright lights), Excellent visibility
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Soft crushed blacks in unlit areas, Sharp artificial shadows, Medium contrast betwen light sources and dark void

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Warm tungsten window spill, but secondary to exterior lighting. Focus on 'Occupancy Glow'
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Heavy use of 'Wall Washing' with Warm Golden floodlights (Sodium Vapor/Warm LED style), Illuminated building facade, Linear outline lighting on buildings

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Long-exposure traffic light trails (streaks of red and white), Brightly illuminated along road
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Occasional uplighting on park trees creating green/yellow contrast

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Classic Teal & Orange (Night Version): Royal Blue/Navy Sky vs Golden/Copper City Lights
color_and_grading.temperature: Strong Warm Cast (2500K-3000K) from city lights vs Deep Cool Blue (8000K) environment
color_and_grading.post_processing: High Vibrance, High Contrast, Dehaze, Clarified light sources, Bloom effect on highlights, Noise reduction for clean night sky

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: V-Ray Night Rendering, Corona Renderer (LightMix), Unreal Engine 5
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: High dynamic Photography, Fine Art Aerial Photography, Travel & Tourism Promotional Imagery
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Pin-sharp light sources, Rich texture in illuminated masonry

environment_textures.ground_surface: Dark road with light streaks, Asphalt roads glowing from streetlights, Dense urban fabric
environment_textures.foliage_style: Dark, muted urban greenery, low visibility compared to architecture
